messages.message: We recently upgraded the mtb sandbox to 22.04 but now it seems that the right-click menu for the file system has changed. Is this a bug or a setting somewhere?
@Xi Cheng do you think this is similar to what you saw on your debug-fs sandbox?
@Aayush Yes, this was what I saw when I reported that to you the first time.
ok, so known issue. Has it been fixed with a particular build or are we taking it on a case-by-case basis?
I've only come across it once but am not sure if this been root-caused so will leave this to @Aayush and the team. It does happen recently in a master that's coming off 22.04
Thank Xi, @Aayush this is a customer sandbox so they will most likely run into this at some point. Any guidance you can provide would be helpful

@Will Yes we definitely need to tackle this because the file service UI is not very useful without those buttons to move/copy files. This problem does seem peculiar because it doesn't show up in dogfood.
